summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 6, Exposition Heights Addition, being the alley between Blakeley Street and University View Place, from 33rd Avenue Northeast to East 47th Street; by grading and paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with property owners' petition, being City Comptroller's File No. 185484, to the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
